<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75344</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>2d440f53-58b4-409b-bca2-402885ee16f2#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Oroszlán</string>
            <string language="en">Lion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Löwe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Leão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Leone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λιοντάρι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">León</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Oroszlánokról (hím és nőstény) készült felvétel. Az afrikai szavannák macskaféle ragadozója.</string>
            <string language="en">Photograph about lions (male and female). Feline carnivorous of African savannas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emlősök,  méhlepényesek,  ragadozók,  </string>
            <string language="en">mammals, placentalia, carnivores</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fotographie über Löwen (Mann und Frau). 
Katzenartiges fleischfressendes der afrikanischen savannas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Photographie au sujet des lions (mâle et 
femelle). Carnivore félin des savannas africains.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fotografia sobre leões (macho e fêmea). 
Carnivorous feline de savannas africanos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fotografia circa i leoni (maschio e femmina). 
Carnivoro felino dei savannas africani.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωτογραφία για τα λιοντάρια (αρσενικό και θηλυκό). 
Αιλουροειδής σαρκοφάγος των αφρικανικών savannas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fotografía sobre leones (varón y hembra). 
Carnívoro felino de savannas africanos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säugetiere, placentalia, fleischfressende Tiere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mammifères, placentalia, carnivores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mamíferos, placentalia, carnivores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mammiferi, placentalia, carnivori</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θηλαστικά, placentalia, carnivores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mamíferos, placentalia, carnívoros</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
